data.title: Furthering education.
data.text: This place is a one stop wonder for those who are seeking to further their education and spiritual awakening.

data.title: Always coolevents going on here
data.text: This is a small, progressive university which also offers space for speakers and wonderful music. I've heard some great gamelan here

data.title: so you want something real!
data.text: so the only Budddist   inspired university in the whole USA want to learn how to work with your mind? You have to be brave ! Come and see yourself  for yourself!

data.title: Naropa, a Contemplative Education
data.text:
Not only for students, Naropa brings in speaker for the public, ones that aren't exactly mainstream, but interesting people, speaking about interesting topics.
Student have a great opportunity to study with some skillful teachers who recognize the contemplative world.  The main campus is lovely, and is pleasant to walk around.

data.title: Touching small campus
data.text: If you like solitude and spirituality this is a great place for contemplation. It really gives one a pure sense of eastern philosophy and the meditation room is gripping even to a novice.

data.title: Peaceful Education
data.text: What an honor to visit this campus.  My daughter is in her first semester here and I have been longing to visit.  I appreciate not only your curriculum, but the peaceful air that abounds across the campus.  Thank you for your work, and thank you for providing a place of education that supports what is needed for a solid educational experience, and nothing more.  I appreciate the humble beauty of your campus.

data.title: Lovely campus!
data.text: Naropa University is a unique school and the campus is lovely.  If you want to set up a tour of the Arapahoe campus, call in advance to arrange a visit.  If you enjoy contemplative arts, there will be a lot for you to see.  Make sure you check out the gardens and the meditation hall if you go!

data.title: New Age Popularism
data.text: The Naropa Institute was founded to promote Buddhist principles in a secular world but has become a New Age haven. The curriculum at Naropa is devoted to exploiting the assets (i.e., money) of truly gullible people. Trungpa was not fond of these popular New Age teachings and would be rolling in his grave, had he not been cremated.
